snippet: Beyoncé, Julianne Moore, Pharrell Williams and others at Chanel’s Paris-Salzburg Métiers d’Art show in New York.
abstract: Fashion editors and celebrities gather at Park Avenue Armory in New York for Chanel runway show to celebrate Karl Lagerfeld's Metiers d'Art collection; show is repeat of one offered in Salzburg, Austria, in December 2014.
lead_paragraph: Beyoncé, Julianne Moore, Pharrell Williams and others at Chanel’s Paris-Salzburg Métiers d’Art show in New York.

headline.print_headline: Next Stop for Chanel on Its Road Trip
headline.main: Karl Lagerfeld Brings Chanel’s Salzburg to New York
